evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 1. Declare that President Donald J. Trump has violated the United States Constitution by engaging in wholesale transformation of the federal government with...

extracted.value: Declare that President Donald J. Trump has violated the United States Constitution by engaging in wholesale transformation of the federal government without any Congressional authorization by and through the Workforce Executive Order.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 2. Declare that OMB, OPM, and DOGE have exceeded statutory authority and acted in an arbitrary and capricious manner and therefore acted unlawfully by ordering federal agencies to act in accordance wi...

extracted.value: Declare that OMB, OPM, and DOGE have exceeded statutory authority and acted in an arbitrary and capricious manner and therefore acted unlawfully by ordering federal agencies to act in accordance with the President’s unconstitutional mandate by and through the Workforce Executive Order and the February 26, 2025 OMB/OPM Memorandum.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 3. Declare that Federal Agency Defendants have acted contrary to statutory authority and in an arbitrary and capricious manner and therefore acted unlawfully by implementing the President’s unconstitu...

extracted.value: Declare that Federal Agency Defendants have acted contrary to statutory authority and in an arbitrary and capricious manner and therefore acted unlawfully by implementing the President’s unconstitutional Workforce Executive Order and the February 26, 2025 OMB Memorandum to reorganize the federal government and RIF large numbers of federal employees, without Congressional authorization.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 4. Vacate the February 11, 2025 Workforce Executive Order, the February 26, 2025 OMB and OPM Memorandum implementing that order; any a...

extracted.value: Vacate the February 11, 2025 Workforce Executive Order, the February 26, 2025 OMB and OPM Memorandum implementing that order; any and all approvals or exemptions awarded by OMB, OPM, or DOGE; any and all orders by OMB, OPM, or DOGE with respect to federal agency ARRPs; and the ARRPs; and issue all necessary and appropriate orders to preserve the status quo pending the resolution of the case.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 5. Temporarily restrain and enjoin the Defendants from implementing or enforcing the February 11, 2025 Workforce Executive Order; the February 26, 2025 OMB and OPM Memorandum implementing that order; ...

extracted.value: Temporarily restrain and enjoin the Defendants from implementing or enforcing the February 11, 2025 Workforce Executive Order; the February 26, 2025 OMB and OPM Memorandum implementing that order; any and all approvals or exemptions awarded by OMB, OPM, or DOGE; any and all orders by OMB, OPM, or DOGE with respect to federal agency ARRPs; and the ARRPs.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 6. Enter preliminary and/or permanent injunctive relief;

extracted.value: Enter preliminary and/or permanent injunctive relief.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 7. Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorneys’ fees, and other disbursements as appropriate;

extracted.value: Award Plaintiffs their costs, reasonable attorneys’ fees, and other disbursements as appropriate.

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: 8. Grant such other relief as this Court may deem proper.

extracted.value: Grant such other relief as this Court may deem proper.

evidence.text: The Constitution vests the legislative power in Congress. U.S. Const., art. I; U.S. Const., art. II
